Spotlight on Brazil: Brazil team profile.
Brazil: of a greatest nation in World Cup history.
And to have the beautiful game's biggest tournament take place in its spiritual home...
...is a prospect exciting football lovers all over the globe.
With this excitement comes great pressure on the host nation...
...to win what would be a record sixth World Cup.
But there is no doubt they are capable of lifting the trophy...
...in Rio's magnificent Maracana Stadium on the 13th of July.
